subject: Clarkson says she's never been in love
body:
Are you sure that your girlfriend is satisfied 
with the size of your `little friend`

No?

So, hurry up then, and get our new super pill 
as quickly as possible at the reduced price, 
before she'll find another guy with a descent willy. 
You can order it on our website: http://www.brushsystemsgroup.com/ 

--
